item.description: Hey Gals & Guys, After the holidays are over - we are planning a dinner at Carrabba's in Manchester. This is a new Italian Restaurant which I have heard very good things about and it is just past Buckland Mall heading toward Manchester. We all will need a nice relaxing night out, good food and fun after the hectic holidays! Please RSVP by Jan. 1st. No "maybe(s)" - too hard to coordinate a firm count! Looking forward to see you both old and new members! Judy C.
item.how_to_find_us: I will be extra early - meet you all in the bar area. I called Carrabba's and it is very elegant in the bar with plenty of seating and just as nice as the rest of the restaurant. I will bring along a balloon so, you can spot our group! Judy C.

group.name: MIXING IT UP IN WEST HARTFORD AND BEYOND

item.name: East of the River Group , Jan. 12, 7 pm, Carrabba's Rest., Manchester
